00108 /* retorna "a - b" en segundos */
00109 double timeval_diff(struct timeval *a, struct timeval *b)
00110 {
00111   return
00112     (double)(a->tv_sec + (double)a->tv_usec/1000000) -
00113     (double)(b->tv_sec + (double)b->tv_usec/1000000);
00114 }

00116 bool check_file_exist(const string &strFilename)
00117 {
00118         struct stat stFileInfo;
00119         int intStat(stat(strFilename.c_str(), &stFileInfo));
00120         bool result = (intStat == 0);
00121         if (!result)
00122         {
00123                 cerr << "ERROR: Path non exist: " << strFilename << endl;
00124         }
00125         return result;
00126 }
00127 
00128 bool check_name(const string &strFilename)
00129 {
00130         typedef boost::tokenizer< boost::char_separator<char> > tokenizer;
00131         boost::char_separator<char> sep("/");
00132         tokenizer tokens(strFilename, sep);
00133 
00134         vector<string> words(tokens.begin(), tokens.end());
00135 
00136         if (strFilename[0] != '-' &&
00137                 words.size() == 1)
00138         {
00139                 return true;
00140         }
00141         return false;
00142 }

00144 void show_help_information()
00145 {
00146         string help("Usage: maggen [OPTIONS]\n\n");
00147         help.append("        where OPTIONS include:\n");
00148         help.append("             -f  file      Define the input file of the tool. Othercase, uses the standart input (cin).\n");
00149         help.append("             -i  header    Including header '.h' or '.hpp' file for resolve externs variables in generated code.\n");
00150         help.append("             -fo folder    Defines the folder output for output generated information.Othercase, uses \"./out_maggen/\".\n");
00151         help.append("             -o  name      Defines the names files generated tool. Otherwise, uses \"mag_eval\".\n");
00152         help.append("             -h            Show this help message.\n");
00153         cout << help << endl;
00154 }

00165 bool parse_parameters(int argc, char *argv[], string &path_input_file, string &path_folder_output, string &name_library, vector<string> &headers)
00166 {
00167         bool file_input_setup(false);
00168         bool folder_output_setup(false);
00169         bool name_file_output_setup(false);
00170 
00171         /* Singular option case: Help info */
00172         if (argc == 2)
00173         {
00174                 string arg_h (argv[1]);
00175                 if (arg_h.compare("-h") == 0)
00176                 {
00177                         show_help_information();
00178                         exit(0);
00179                 }
00180                 else
00181                 {
00182                         return false;
00183                 }
00184         }
00185 
00186         /* Multiples options case */
00187         int i(1);
00188         while (i < argc)
00189         {
00190                 if (argc > i + 1)
00191                 {
00192                         string arg_i (argv[i++]);
00193                         string value_arg_i(argv[i++]);
00194 
00195                         if ((arg_i.compare("-f") == 0) && (!file_input_setup) && (check_file_exist(value_arg_i)))
00196                         {
00197                                 file_input_setup = true;
00198                                 path_input_file = value_arg_i;
00199                         }
00200                         else if ((arg_i.compare("-fo") == 0) && (!folder_output_setup))
00201                         {
00202                                 folder_output_setup = true;
00203                                 path_folder_output = value_arg_i;
00204                         }
00205                         else if ((arg_i.compare("-o") == 0) && (!name_file_output_setup) && (check_name(value_arg_i)))
00206                         {
00207                                 name_file_output_setup = true;
00208                                 name_library = value_arg_i;
00209                         }
00210                         else if ((arg_i.compare("-i") == 0) && (check_file_exist(value_arg_i)))
00211                         {
00212                                 headers.push_back(value_arg_i);
00213                         }
00214                         else
00215                         {
00216                                 return false;
00217                         }
00218                 }
00219                 else
00220                 {
00221                         return false;
00222                 }
00223         }
00224         return true;
00225 }
00226 }

00233 int main
00234 (
00235         int argc,      /* Number of strings in array argv. */
00236         char *argv[],  /* Array of command-line argument strings. */
00237         char *envp[]   /* Array of environment variable string. */
00238 )
00239 {
00240         struct timeval t_ini, t_fin;
00241         double secs;
00242         gettimeofday(&t_ini, NULL);
00243         string path(argv[0]);
00244     string path_only(path.begin(), path.end()-6);
00245 
00246         string path_input_file(DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE);
00247         string path_folder_output(DEFAULT_PATH);
00248         string name_library(DEFAULT_FILE_NAME);
00249         vector<string> headers;
00250 
00251         if(!parse_parameters(argc, argv, path_input_file, path_folder_output, name_library, headers))
00252         {
00253                 string err_use("ERROR: maggen wrong uses.\n\n");
00254                 cerr << err_use << endl;
00255                 show_help_information();
00256                 exit(-1);
00257         }
00258 
00259         if (DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE == path_input_file)
00260         {
00261             string line;
00262                 std::ofstream file_input(path_input_file.c_str());
00263             while (!cin.eof())
00264             {
00265                 getline(cin, line);
00266                 line.append("\n");
00267                 file_input.write(line.c_str(), line.size());
00268             }
00269             file_input.close();
00270         }
00271 
00272         Maglib gen;
00273         int exit_code = gen.gen_evaluator(path_input_file, path_folder_output, name_library, headers, path_only);
00274 
00275         if (exit_code == 0)
00276         {
00277                 gettimeofday(&t_fin, NULL);
00278                 secs = timeval_diff(&t_fin, &t_ini);
00279                 printf("\nGeneration complete in: %.6g seconds.\n", secs);
00280         }
00281 
00282         return exit_code;
00283 }
